name: github-actions config advanced ts
description: Auto-generated spike for github-actions config in ts (advanced).

files.template:
name: CI
on: [push, pull_request]
jobs:
  test:
    strategy:
      matrix:
        node: [18, 20, 22]
        os: [ubuntu-latest, macos-latest]
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ matrix.node }}
          cache: npm
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run lint --if-present
      - run: npm test -- --coverage

name: Monorepo CI
on: [push, pull_request]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        package: ['packages/app', 'packages/api']
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with: { node-version: '20' }
      - run: npm ci
      - run: cd ${{ matrix.package }} && npm ci && npm test --if-present
